lyrics:
OK, roll the drums! 

I wanna girl, I wanna girl who always has the time, To send my world and count 
the stars above, I wanna girl, I wanna girl, who still believes in love, 
Someone 
who's sensitive enough... 

I wanna girl, oh, I wanna girl that I can really trust, I wanna girl, a girl 
that's patient 
and who'll love me when it's rough.. I wanna girl, I wanna girl as smart as 
she'is fine, Someone that I can say is mine.. 

This girl I'm describing, really does exist, baby have you noticed.. 

CHORUS: I wanna girl like you, To be with me tonight, I wanna kiss your lips, 
and hold you close if that's alright, I wanna girl like you, to keep the feelin 
new, I want make the words to say the most...I LOVE YOU, And your love is all I 
ever need... 

I wanna girl, a girl who makes me laugh, I want her sentimental, and to be my 
better half, ah yeah, I wanna girl like the my father loves, If that's the one 
I'm dreaming of.. 

Only one girl lives up to whats on my list, So you need to know this.. 

Repeat CHORUS 

This should be play at high volume, preferably in a residential area 

RAP: 
I wanna girl if thats alright
I wanna girl to hold me tight
I want you baby (if thats alright with you)
I wanna girl just like you
I wanna girl who makes me do...
Do anything she wants me to (if thats alright with you)

I wanna girl thats patient
I wanna girl thats kind
I just want you baby if thats alright with you
I wanna girl who loves me
Who always has the time
I just need you baby if thats alright with you
